name: CrashCourseThunderTrigger
description:
Story

Bad events taking place inside a plane that gets hacked during a storm, you need to decrypt the blackbox and restore control over the plane before the crash

Controls

Left Mouse Button to Interact with objects ( Yellow and Blue Key are disabled)
AWSD  keys to move around

Limitation

Some object's are intractable from the edges ( so try to click around them instead)

Due to time limit, the game was reduced to 2 chapters - Stop after you open the Dual Lock (A - 1) slot

Contribution

Some 3D assets were taken from Sketchfab users, so if you passed by them applaud to them.

Disclaimer

This is the first time I ever use Unigine Engine in a project, so don't judge the engine... cuz its simply awesome ;)
